This is probably coming late, I just have to add a little comment for pauloadeando . An AUDIO(This prefix denotes auditory, or hearing with your EARS-these are the giant egg shaped things sticking out of the side of your head)-book, is a format of information transfer via the "hearing' senses. Thanks for your time.

Just to be perfectly clear to all those downloaders: the format on this is .mov - quicktime movie. The "video" is a static shot of the book cover while the audiobook plays. 

I tried 'viewing' this audiobook in quicktime and nero: there don't seem to be chapter breaks.
